TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRibbonControl

summary.span: 表示传给每个功能区用户界面 (UI) 控件回调过程的对象。

span.span: Represents the object passed into every Ribbon user interface (UI) control's callback procedure.

span.para: IRibbonControl对象包含的名称 (ID) 的控件和的当前Window对象的功能区 UI 控件。
The IRibbonControl object contains the name (ID) of the control and the current Window object for the Ribbon UI control.
以下用 C# 编写的示例演示了从一个按钮控件和切换按钮控件的onAction事件过程调用的两个过程。在第一个过程中，表示控件的IRibbonControl对象传递到过程，并指示按钮已按下按钮的 ID 以及显示一个消息框。第二个过程是类似于第一个并添加了一个布尔参数，指示已按下按钮。
span.code: public void ButtonOnAction(IRibbonControl control) MessageBox.Show("Button clicked: " + control.Id); } public void ToggleButtonOnAction(IRibbonControl control, bool pressed) { ...if (pressed) MessageBox.Show("ToggleButton was switched on."); else MessageBox.Show("ToggleButton was switched off."); }

span.para: The following example, written in C#, shows two procedures called from the onAction event procedure of a Button control and a ToggleButton control. In the first procedure, the IRibbonControl object representing the control is passed into the procedure and a message box is displayed indicating that the button was pressed along with the ID of the button. The second procedure is similar to the first with the addition of a Boolean parameter indicating that the button was pressed.
span.code: public void ButtonOnAction(IRibbonControl control) MessageBox.Show("Button clicked: " + control.Id); } public void ToggleButtonOnAction(IRibbonControl control, bool pressed) { ...if (pressed) MessageBox.Show("ToggleButton was switched on."); else MessageBox.Show("ToggleButton was switched off."); }

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Context { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 代表包含触发回调过程的功能区用户界面的活动窗口。只读。

span.span: Represents the active window containing the Ribbon user interface that triggers a callback procedure. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在功能区 XML 标记自定义文件中指定的控件的 ID。只读。

span.span: Gets the ID of the control specified in the Ribbon XML markup customization file. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Tag As String
public: property System::String ^ Tag { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 用于存储任意字符串，并在运行时获取这些字符串。只读

span.span: Used to store arbitrary strings and fetch them at runtime. Read-only

span.para: 通常，您可以区分功能区用户界面 XML 自定义文件中使用的Id属性的控件。但是，有限制可以包含的 Id （任何非字母数字字符，且它们都必须是唯一）。 Tag属性不具有这些限制，因此可以使用它在下列情况下，其中 ID 不起作用：
span.list:
如果需要存储您控件，如文件名的特殊字符串。 例如： tag="C:\path\file.xlsm。" 如果您想要的多个控件的
相同的方式处理回调过程，但您不想要维护所有其 Id （这必须是唯一的） 的列表。 例如，您无法具有功能区上的不同选项卡上的按钮，所有具有标记 ="blue"，然后只需签Tag属性而不是ID属性时设置某些常见操作。

span.para: Normally you can distinguish between controls in a Ribbon user interface XML customization file using the Id property. However, there are restrictions on what IDs can contain (no non-alphanumeric characters, and they must all be unique). The Tag property doesn’t have these restrictions and so it can be used in the following situations, where ID doesn’t work:

item.para: If you need to store a special string with your control such as a filename. For example: tag=”C:\path\file.xlsm.”

If you want multiple controls to be treated the same way by your callback procedures, but you don’t want to maintain a list of all of their IDs (which must be unique). For example, you could have buttons on different tabs on the Ribbon, all with tag=”blue”, and then just check the Tag property instead of the ID property when perfroming some common action.

span.para: 在用于自定义功能区用户界面 XML 中，您可以设置标记，如下所示。当调用 MyFunction 操作时，您可以阅读Tag属性，将等于"某些字符串"。
In the XML used to customize the Ribbon user interface, you can set a tag as follows. When the MyFunction action is called, you can read the Tag property, which will be equal to “some string”.
